contactyourmep: The name of the extension's entry in Special:SpecialPages
apihelp-eucc-get-representatives-param-c: Description for country param of eucc-get-representatives API
eucc-country-picker-layout-label: Label for first step of the process, selecting representative
eucc-contact-layout-label: Label for second step of the process, composing the mail
eucc-call-layout-label: Label for third step of the process, calling the representative
eucc-contact-button-copy-mail-label: Label for button to copy the mail text to clipboard
eucc-contact-button-send-mail-label: Label for button to compile mail and open local mail client
eucc-email-greeting: Greeting for the email. $1 - Name of the represetative
eucc-email-user-info: Information on the sender in mail. $1 - First name of sender, $2 - Second name of sender, $3 - Country of residence of the sender
eucc-email-part-one-v1: First part of static email text, after custom text, but before issue (theme) selection - variation 1
eucc-email-part-one-v2: First part of static email text, after custom text, but before issue (theme) selection - variation 2
eucc-email-part-one-v3: First part of static email text, after custom text, but before issue (theme) selection - variation 3
eucc-email-issues-intro: Email text showing as an intro for issue selection
eucc-email-outro-v1: Email text appearing at the end of the email, before complimentary close - variation 1
eucc-email-outro-v2: Email text appearing at the end of the email, before complimentary close - variation 2
eucc-email-outro-v3: Email text appearing at the end of the email, before complimentary close - variation 3
eucc-email-part-two: Seconds part of static email text, showing after issue selection.
eucc-email-complimentary-close: Complimentary close text in the email
eucc-email-newsletter-label: Label for checkbox that subscribes user to wikimedia mailing list
eucc-email-privacy-policy-label: Label for link to wikimedia privacy policy
eucc-email-custom-text-placeholder: Placeholder for optional field where user can write custom content for the mail
eucc-option-protect-public-domain-label: Issue selector - option Protect Public domain - title
eucc-option-protect-public-domain-text-v: Issue selector - option Protect Public domain - text - variation 1
Issue selector - option Protect Public domain - text - variation 2
Issue selector - option Protect Public domain - text - variation 3
eucc-option-freedom-of-panorama-label: Issue selector - option Freedom of Panorama - title
eucc-option-freedom-of-panorama-text-v1: Issue selector - option Freedom of Panorama - text - variation 1
eucc-option-freedom-of-panorama-text-v2: Issue selector - option Freedom of Panorama - text - variation 2
eucc-option-freedom-of-panorama-text-v3: Issue selector - option Freedom of Panorama - text - variation 3
eucc-option-exception-for-ucg-label: Issue selector - option Exception for User-generated Content - title
eucc-option-exception-for-ucg-text-v1: Issue selector - option Exception for User-generated Content - text - variation 1
eucc-option-exception-for-ucg-text-v2: Issue selector - option Exception for User-generated Content - text - variation 2
eucc-option-exception-for-ucg-text-v3: Issue selector - option Exception for User-generated Content - text - variation 3
eucc-option-exception-for-text-and-data-: Issue selector - option Text and Data Mining Exceptions - title
Issue selector - option Text and Data Mining Exceptions - text - variation 1
Issue selector - option Text and Data Mining Exceptions - text - variation 2
Issue selector - option Text and Data Mining Exceptions - text - variation 3
eucc-call-intro: Introduction text on why you should call your representative
eucc-call-representative-label: Label showing who is being contacted. $1 - name of the representative
eucc-call-representative-phone-brussels: Phone number in Brussels. $1 - phone number
eucc-call-represetntative-phone-strasbou: Phone number in Strasbourg. $1 - phone number
eucc-thank-you-text: Text for the main message on Thank you page
eucc-share-tweet-text: Text to be posted to twitter. $1 - hashtag text/anchor, $2 - URL to page to take action
eucc-share-tweet-button-label: Label for button that posts to twitted
eucc-copy-to-clipboard-success: Message alerting user mail has been copied to the clipboard
eucc-copy-to-clipboard-fail: Message alerting user mail cannot copied to the clipboard
eucc-restart-label: Label for the link restarting the contact process
eucc-learn-more: Label for the link leading to a page when user can learn more about Wikimedia movement
